Name: HAYAI
About the game: Five Ronin, destined for death. The only things they trust - their weapon and their speed. Use your mouse and draw your line of attack to kill your enemies in endless arena combat. Everything can be killed in one hit - including you. How long can you survive? Gameplay Features: Unique mouse-based combat system 5 characters, each with different playstyles Frenetic combo system Leaderboards to compete against your friends and the world Achievements that force you to change up tactics Drawing tablet support (enable from options)
